hero.title: Innovative Rail Crossing Solutions
hero.subtitle: Three decades of expertise in designing, manufacturing and supplying bespoke rail crossing systems for worldwide rail infrastructure projects.

solutions.title: Railway Crossing Solutions by Type
solutions.subtitle: Comprehensive crossing systems designed for every rail infrastructure need

roadCrossings.title: Road Crossings
roadCrossings.description: Innovative road crossing products designed to provide dimensional stability at any angle in all operating conditions. From heavy industrial traffic to standard road crossings, our systems accommodate extreme loading while maintaining structural integrity.

roadRailAccessPoints.title: Road Rail Access Points (RRAPs)
roadRailAccessPoints.description: Perfect solutions for permanent and temporary Road Rail Access Points with fast, efficient installation. Our versatile crossing systems are designed to allow for quick setup while maintaining safety standards for maintenance access.

userWorkedCrossings.title: User Worked Crossings
userWorkedCrossings.description: Manually operated crossings typically found on private or country roads where traffic levels are limited. These crossings require reliable, durable solutions that can withstand intermittent heavy loads while maintaining safety.

pedestrianCrossings.title: Pedestrian Crossings
pedestrianCrossings.description: Safe transit solutions for foot traffic across tracks, supplied to rail networks throughout Europe, Australia and New Zealand. Our pedestrian panels provide secure, comfortable crossing surfaces that can be customised for specific track configurations.

metroTramways.title: Metro & Tramways
metroTramways.description: Especially suitable for long crossings and those with complex crossovers, turnouts and tight bends which are commonplace in tramway systems. Our solutions can be cut and shaped to fit around complex track furniture and infrastructure.

drainage.title: Railway Drainage Solutions
drainage.subtitle: Advanced trackside water management with sustainable drainage systems designed specifically for railway environments and Network Rail compliance.
drainage.intro: Our revolutionary drainage technology transforms railway water management through innovative polymer solutions made from 100% recycled materials. Designed specifically for the challenging demands of railway environments.

benefits.rapidInstall: Rapid Installation: Significantly faster deployment than traditional concrete systems, minimising track downtime
benefits.superiorPerformance: Superior Performance: Enhanced hydraulic capacity with proven flood protection capabilities
benefits.networkRailApproved: Network Rail Approved: Fully compliant with railway infrastructure standards and specifications
benefits.sustainable: Sustainable Solution: 614kg COâ‚‚e savings per mÂ³ compared to concrete alternatives
benefits.modularDesign: Modular Design: Flexible system adapts to various trackside configurations and drainage requirements
benefits.provenDurability: Proven Durability: Engineered for the demanding conditions of railway environments

drainage.outro: Essential for trackside areas, cutting drainage, platform water management, and any railway surface where effective water management is critical for operational safety and infrastructure protection.

featuredProducts.title: Featured Crossing Systems
featuredProducts.subtitle: Our flagship railway crossing systems engineered for superior performance

benefits.title: The Rosehill Rail Advantage
benefits.subtitle: Three decades of innovation in railway crossing technology

ukManufacturing.title: UK Manufacturing
ukManufacturing.description: Based in Sowerby Bridge, West Yorkshire, with strategic access to major transport links for efficient global delivery.

recycledMaterials.title: 100% Recycled Materials
recycledMaterials.description: Sustainably manufactured from recycled tyre rubber using our unique cold cure bonding process, supporting circular economy goals.

bespokeManufacturing.title: Bespoke Manufacturing
bespokeManufacturing.description: Custom solutions tailored to your specific project needs with comprehensive quality assurance and ISO 9001:2015 certification.

fullTraceability.title: Full Traceability
fullTraceability.description: Every panel marked with essential information and digitally tracked back to order and manufacturing batch for complete peace of mind.

history.title: A Proud History Spanning Three Decades in the Rail Industry
history.paragraph1: Rosehill Rail began its journey in 1991 when approached by Reidel Omni to develop a faster, more environmentally friendly polyurethane-based system for bonding rubber panels. Our innovative cold cure bonding process reduced curing time to just 1.5 hours, revolutionising production efficiency.
history.paragraph2: After purchasing Omni's moulds in 1999, we established Rosehill Rail and continue our dedication to innovation and sustainability in rail technology, collaborating with worldwide rail infrastructure firms to develop bespoke crossing solutions.

cta.title: Ready to discuss your rail crossing project?

products.title: Complete Rail Infrastructure Solutions
products.subtitle: From heavy-duty crossing systems to safety panels, discover our comprehensive range of sustainable, high-performance products engineered for modern rail networks.

connectSystem.name: CONNECT System
connectSystem.description: Innovative dimensional stability solution for heavy traffic and acute-angle crossings. Features integrated matrix design with simple bolt connections.

strandLockSystem.name: StrandLock System
strandLockSystem.description: Post-tensioned level crossing system with steel strand reinforcement for locked-in dimensional stability on the most demanding rail crossings.

linkSystem.name: LINK System
linkSystem.description: Horizontal linking system designed for high-speed rail. NEW tongue and groove connections prevent panel separation under dynamic loads.

interlockingRRAP.name: Interlocking RRAP
interlockingRRAP.description: High-strength modular Road Rail Access Point system. Sleeper-spacing independent design for temporary or permanent installations.

baseplateSystem.name: Baseplate System
baseplateSystem.description: Fast installation system ideal for average-sized crossings. Panels can be cut to fit around fishplates, check rails, and tight curves.

titanSystem.name: TITAN Heavy Duty System
titanSystem.description: Ultimate solution for mining and construction environments. Engineered to handle articulated dumpers and multi-axle haul trucks with steel-like strength.

antiTrespassPanels.name: Anti-Trespass Panels
antiTrespassPanels.description: Conical stud design panels reducing unauthorised track access by up to 78%. Available in three variations for different applications.

walkwayPanels.name: Walkway Panels
walkwayPanels.description: Sustainable alternative to concrete with 40+ year design life. Slip-resistant surface (PSV 45) with minimal ground preparation required.

rubberEdgeBeams.name: Rubber Edge Beams
rubberEdgeBeams.description: Lightweight alternative to concrete with strategic lifting points. Non-spalling design with integrated drainage channels.

steelPlasticEdgeBeams.name: Steel & Plastic Edge Beams
steelPlasticEdgeBeams.description: Versatile solutions for varying requirements. Steel for maximum durability in high-traffic areas, plastic for lightweight corrosion-resistant applications.

accessories.name: Accessories & Spares
accessories.description: Comprehensive range of accessories, spares, and specialist tools to support all Rosehill Rail crossing systems - from lifting equipment to fixing solutions and everything in between.

about.title: Three Decades of Rail Innovation
about.subtitle: From pioneering cold cure technology to becoming a trusted global leader in sustainable rail crossing solutions.

theBeginning.title: The Beginning
theBeginning.description: Rosehill Rail, a subsidiary of Rosehill Polymers Group, entered the rail industry when approached by American company Reidel Omni to develop a revolutionary polyurethane-based bonding system for rubber railway crossing surfaces.

innovationBreakthrough.title: Innovation Breakthrough
innovationBreakthrough.description: Our team successfully developed a cold cure bonding process, reducing curing time to just 1.5 hours - a massive improvement over traditional vulcanisation methods that required extended high-temperature heating.

independenceGrowth.title: Independence & Growth
independenceGrowth.description: When Omni ceased railway panel production, Rosehill seized the opportunity by purchasing their moulds and beginning our own production of railway crossing panels, marking the true start of Rosehill Rail.

globalLeadership.title: Global Leadership
globalLeadership.description: Now a trusted industry leader, we collaborate with rail infrastructure firms worldwide, delivering bespoke crossing solutions that meet specific project requirements across all continents.

bespokeManufacturing.title: Bespoke Manufacturing
bespokeManufacturing.description: Every product is tailored to meet specific client needs. Our manufacturing process follows comprehensive operating instructions with meticulous documentation management within robust production and quality frameworks.

precisionQuality.title: Precision & Quality
precisionQuality.description: ISO 9001:2015 certified with annual NQA audits. Our state-of-the-art computer-controlled manufacturing is overseen by highly trained professionals using purpose-built machinery for railway crossing panels.

completeTraceability.title: Complete Traceability
completeTraceability.description: Every panel is digitally tracked with production data, weight checks, and visual inspections. Each panel is marked with crossing grade, rail type, sleeper type, fastener type, and year of manufacture for easy site verification.

environmentalLeadership.title: Environmental Leadership
environmentalLeadership.description: Manufactured using 100% recycled rubber tyres with advanced polyurethane binders through our revolutionary cold-cure process. Our panels pose no environmental risk and won't leach chemicals or emit harmful vapours.

exclusiveDesignRights.title: Exclusive Design Rights
exclusiveDesignRights.description: All components in our level crossing systems are designed by Rosehill Rail, including those supplied under other names by our global distributors, ensuring consistent quality and innovation.

strategicLocation.title: Strategic Location
strategicLocation.description: Based in Sowerby Bridge, West Yorkshire, we benefit from strategic access to major transport links, enhancing our ability to deliver products efficiently both locally and globally.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Expert support for your rail infrastructure projects. From technical advice to professional training - we're here to help.
contact.responseTimeMessage: We respond to all enquiries within one working day

form.title: Send us a Message
form.messagePlaceholder: Please provide details about your enquiry, including project requirements, timelines, or specific questions...

training.title: Professional Training Courses
training.description1: At Rosehill Rail, we're dedicated to working closely with our partners and customers, providing all the support you need to specify, install, and maintain our products effectively.
training.description2: As part of this commitment, we offer free training courses at our dedicated training centre in Sowerby Bridge, covering all aspects of installation, commissioning, and maintenance of our level crossing and RRAP systems.
training.description3: Whether you're an installer, specifier, or network operator, our training sessions can be tailored to your specific needs. Our technical team is also available to answer queries related to design, specification advice, or compatibility checks.

features.freeOfCharge: Free of charge training at our Sowerby Bridge facility
features.flexibleDuration: Flexible duration - half day or full day courses
features.tailoredContent: Tailored content for installers, specifiers, and operators
features.expertInstruction: Expert instruction from our technical team
features.handsOnTraining: Hands-on training with actual products and systems

training.expertTrainingValue: Expert training is invaluable for ensuring projects run on time and on budget. Fill out the contact form above and we'll get back to you within one working day to discuss your requirements and available dates.

footer.complianceText: All components designed by Rosehill Rail with exclusive design rights. Quality assured to ISO 9001:2015 standard with annual NQA audits.
footer.accreditationsList: ISO 9001:2015 â€¢ Network Rail Approved â€¢ Full Traceability

thankYou.title: Thank You!
thankYou.message: Your message has been successfully sent. Our team will review your enquiry and get back to you within one working day.
thankYou.urgentMessage: If your enquiry is urgent, please don't hesitate to call us directly:

waveSection.title: Advanced Wave Effect Management
waveSection.paragraph1: The LINK System's horizontal linking technology accommodates movement during the wave effect of differing vehicle loads applied from one panel to another, preventing separation of panels under dynamic conditions.
waveSection.paragraph2: This innovative approach ensures consistent performance even when high-speed trains create varying load patterns across the crossing surface, maintaining dimensional stability and safety.
waveSection.paragraph3: Our NEW moulded rubber tongue and groove connections provide superior panel-to-panel linking compared to traditional crossing systems.

horizontalLinking.title: Horizontal Linking
horizontalLinking.desc: Advanced linking system prevents vertical lift and panel separation under dynamic loading conditions.

tongueGroove.title: NEW Tongue & Groove
tongueGroove.desc: Moulded rubber connections provide superior panel-to-panel linking and enhanced system integrity.

ukManufactured.title: UK Manufactured
ukManufactured.desc: Sustainably manufactured in the UK from 100% recycled tyre rubber with unique polyurethane chemistry.

highSpeed.title: High-Speed Ready
highSpeed.desc: Specifically engineered to handle the challenges of faster train speeds and dynamic loading effects.

universalCompatibility.title: Universal Compatibility
universalCompatibility.desc: Full rail profile adaptability and universal gauge compatibility with 600mm sleeper centres.

costEfficient.title: Cost Efficient
costEfficient.desc: Reduces installation time and minimises track possession requirements for significant cost savings.

specs.title: Technical Specifications
specs.intro1: The LINK System represents the next generation of rail crossing technology, specifically designed to meet the challenges of modern high-speed rail networks.
specs.intro2: Each panel is compression-manufactured using our exclusive cold cure moulding process and unique polyurethane chemistry, ensuring the panels have the surface deflection of rubber but the strength required for demanding applications.
specs.keyInnovationDesc: NEW moulded rubber tongue and groove connections secure against vertical lift and manage dynamic loading effects while maintaining dimensional stability.

highSpeedRail.title: High-Speed Rail Networks
highSpeedRail.desc: Specifically designed to handle the dynamic loads and wave effects created by high-speed train operations.

urbanTransit.title: Urban Transit Systems
urbanTransit.desc: Perfect for busy urban crossings where consistent performance under varying load conditions is critical.

dynamicLoad.title: Dynamic Load Environments
dynamicLoad.desc: Ideal for crossings experiencing variable loading patterns that require advanced panel linking technology.

retrofit.title: Retrofit Projects
retrofit.desc: Excellent for upgrading existing crossings to handle increased speeds and improved safety standards.

cta.title: Ready for High-Speed Performance?
cta.description: Discover how the LINK System can enhance your rail network's performance with advanced wave effect management and superior panel linking technology.

hero.title: TITAN System
hero.subtitle: The world's strongest rail crossing system designed for articulated dumpers, multi-axle haul trucks, and the heaviest industrial traffic.

benefits.engineeringDesc1: TITAN represents the pinnacle of crossing technology, combining Rosehill Rail's exclusive cold cure moulding process with unique polyurethane chemistry to create panels with the surface deflection of rubber but the strength of steel.
benefits.engineeringDesc2: Individual panels are manufactured under compression to ensure dimensional stability and combat Compressive Set, preventing distortion and gapping that can compromise safety and performance in heavy-duty applications.
benefits.highlightDesc: Designed specifically for mining, construction, and heavyweight industrial environments where standard crossing solutions simply cannot cope with the extreme loading conditions.
benefits.surfaceDesc: Flexible rubber surface adapts to vehicle loading while maintaining grip and comfort
benefits.strengthDesc: Steel-level strength prevents distortion under extreme industrial loading conditions
benefits.performanceNote: Revolutionary cold cure moulding process delivers unmatched performance
benefits.extremeLoadDesc: Handles articulated dumpers, multi-axle haul trucks, and ballast tractors in the most demanding industrial environments.
benefits.advancedMaterialsDesc: Exclusive cold cure moulding process and unique polyurethane chemistry for unparalleled durability and performance.
benefits.antiCompressiveDesc: Manufactured under compression to prevent distortion and gapping, maintaining dimensional stability under extreme loads.
benefits.tongueGrooveDesc: NEW moulded rubber tongue and groove connections secure against vertical lift and panel separation.
benefits.matrixSystemDesc: Entire crossing held in one matrix preventing accidental panel dislodging with end restraint security.
benefits.longCrossingsDesc: Particularly suitable for long crossings and angled road intersections requiring maximum structural integrity.

specs.intro1: TITAN is engineered for the most extreme conditions, combining innovative manufacturing techniques with premium materials to create the ultimate heavy-duty crossing solution.
specs.intro2: The system's unique compression manufacturing process ensures each panel maintains dimensional stability while the tongue and groove connections provide secure interlocking to prevent vertical lift under extreme loading.
specs.intro3: Recommended installation includes Rosehill Rail's exclusive Rubber Edge Beam system with wide outer panels for maximum performance and longevity.
specs.recommendedEdgeBeamValue: Rubber Edge Beam with wide panels

applications.miningDesc: Designed to handle the extreme loads of mining equipment including articulated dumpers and heavy haul vehicles.
applications.constructionDesc: Perfect for construction environments with multi-axle haul trucks and heavy machinery requiring robust crossing solutions.
applications.haulageDesc: Accommodates the world's heaviest traffic including ballast tractors and oversized industrial transportation.
applications.industrialDesc: Ideal for heavy industrial environments where standard crossing solutions cannot cope with extreme loading conditions.

cta.title: Need Ultimate Heavy-Duty Performance?
cta.description: Discover how TITAN can handle your most extreme industrial crossing requirements with unmatched strength and durability.

hero.title: Baseplate System
hero.subtitle: Versatile rubber crossing panels that can be cut to fit around fishplates, check rails, and turnouts for rapid deployment.

cutToFit.title: Ultimate Adaptability
cutToFit.paragraph1: The Baseplate system's solid rubber panels can be cut to fit around fishplates, check rails (single and double), and turnouts, making them especially useful for tramway applications and tight curves.
cutToFit.paragraph2: This flexibility allows for very fast installation and makes the system ideal for average sized crossings across various applications from track access and depots to agricultural and pedestrian use.
cutToFit.highlightText: Panels can be modified for cut-to-fit installations, and individual panels can be removed and replaced without dislodging neighbouring panels.
cutToFit.feature1: Can be cut to fit around complex infrastructure
cutToFit.feature2: Perfect for tramway applications and tight curves
cutToFit.feature3: 1.8 metre standard length, can be cut in half
cutToFit.feature4: Simple baseplate pulls panels together securely
cutToFit.feature5: Compatible with all edge beam types

rapidInstallation.title: Rapid Installation
rapidInstallation.description: Extremely quick to install and remove using a simple baseplate mechanism that requires no specific tools.

cutToFitDesign.title: Cut-to-Fit Design
cutToFitDesign.description: Solid rubber panels can be cut to fit around fishplates, check rails, and turnouts for complex installations.

versatileApplications.title: Versatile Applications
versatileApplications.description: Available in various grades to accommodate track access, depots, agricultural, and pedestrian applications.

tramwayCompatible.title: Tramway Compatible
tramwayCompatible.description: Panels can be manufactured to fit around tight curves, making them especially useful for tramway applications.

individualReplacement.title: Individual Replacement
individualReplacement.description: Individual panels can be removed and replaced without dislodging neighbouring panels for easy maintenance.

universalCompatibility.title: Universal Compatibility
universalCompatibility.description: Adapted for all types of rail, clips, sleepers, and gauge types with anti-skid compliance.

specs.title: Technical Specifications
specs.paragraph1: The Baseplate System provides maximum flexibility for crossing installations where standard solutions may not fit. Designed for average sized crossings, this system excels in situations requiring adaptation to existing infrastructure.
specs.paragraph2: Each panel is manufactured to 1.8 meters and can be cut in half for shorter crossings, providing unprecedented installation flexibility while maintaining structural integrity and safety compliance.
specs.railCompatibilityValue: All rail types, clips and sleepers

gallery.image1Alt: Baseplate system at Dean Lane Manchester
gallery.image3Alt: Cut-to-fit baseplate installation at Thornton Gate

tramwaySystems.title: Tramway Systems
tramwaySystems.description: Perfect for tramway applications with tight curves and complex track configurations requiring cut-to-fit solutions.

pedestrianCrossings.title: Pedestrian Crossings
pedestrianCrossings.description: Ideal for pedestrian crossings requiring quick installation and compliance with anti-skid safety requirements.

agriculturalAccess.title: Agricultural Access
agriculturalAccess.description: Suitable for agricultural crossings where flexible installation and easy modification capabilities are essential.

depotMaintenance.title: Depot & Maintenance
depotMaintenance.description: Perfect for depot and maintenance facility access points requiring rapid deployment and removal capabilities.

cta.title: Need Fast, Flexible Installation?
cta.text: Discover how the Baseplate System can provide rapid deployment and cut-to-fit flexibility for your crossing requirements.

integratedMatrix.title: Integrated Matrix Design
integratedMatrix.desc: Unified system with simple bolt connections ensures stability and prevents panel displacement under heavy loads.

quickInstall.title: Quick Installation
quickInstall.desc: Rapid deployment reduces track possession times and minimises service disruption for busy rail networks.

selectiveMaintenance.title: Selective Maintenance
selectiveMaintenance.desc: Individual panels can be removed and replaced without dismantling the entire crossing system.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Solution
sustainable.desc: Manufactured from 100% recycled rubber with unique polyurethane bonding technology.

universalCompatibility.title: Universal Compatibility
universalCompatibility.desc: Adaptable to all gauge types, rail profiles, and clips while maintaining dimensional stability.

costEffective.title: Cost Effective
costEffective.desc: Lower lifecycle maintenance costs and simplified inventory management reduce total ownership costs.

specs.title: Technical Specifications
specs.intro1: The CONNECT System provides dimensional stability at any angle in all operating conditions. Designed specifically for heavy traffic scenarios, this system excels in very long crossings and those positioned at acute angles to the road.
specs.intro2: Each panel is compression-manufactured to ensure consistent performance and features our unique cold-cure polyurethane bonding technology for superior durability and environmental performance.

heavyTraffic.title: Heavy Traffic Crossings
heavyTraffic.desc: Designed to handle extreme traffic loads while maintaining dimensional stability and safety standards.

acuteAngle.title: Acute Angle Crossings
acuteAngle.desc: Perfect solution for crossings positioned at challenging angles to the road infrastructure.

longCrossings.title: Long Crossings
longCrossings.desc: Ideal for extended crossing installations where traditional solutions may struggle with consistency.

industrial.title: Industrial Sites
industrial.desc: Suitable for industrial environments requiring robust, reliable crossing solutions with minimal maintenance.

cta.title: Ready to Upgrade Your Crossings?
cta.text: Discover how the CONNECT System can provide dimensional stability and reduce maintenance costs for your rail infrastructure projects.

hero.title: Interlocking RRAP
hero.subtitle: High-strength modular Road Rail Access Point system that can be installed independent of sleeper spacing.

modularSection.title: Ultimate Flexibility
modularSection.paragraph1: Individual panels are manufactured to fit the specific rail, sleeper, and fastener type to ensure the perfect fit, then linked together to prevent them becoming dislodged.
modularSection.paragraph2: This innovative approach means you're not constrained by existing sleeper spacing patterns - the system adapts to your infrastructure, not the other way around.
modularSection.highlightText: Each panel is custom-manufactured for your specific rail profile, sleeper type, and fastener configuration, ensuring optimal performance and safety.
modularSection.caption: Interlocking RRAP adapts to any sleeper spacing configuration - standard systems require 600mm centres

flexibleInstallation.title: Flexible Installation
flexibleInstallation.description: Quick and simple installation using connecting bolts with no specific tools required for rapid deployment.

reducedPossession.title: Reduced Possession
reducedPossession.description: Designed to be quick and easy to install, significantly reducing track possession times and associated costs.

perfectFit.title: Perfect Fit
perfectFit.description: Individual panels manufactured to fit specific rail, sleeper, and fastener types ensuring optimal performance.

interlockingDesign.title: Interlocking Design
interlockingDesign.description: Panels are linked together to prevent dislodging while maintaining consistent performance stability.

costEffective.title: Cost Effective
costEffective.description: Lower installation costs and reduced possession times deliver significant cost savings for rail operators.

multiPurpose.title: Multi-Purpose
multiPurpose.description: Ideal for temporary, semi-permanent, and permanent access points with enhanced lateral support.

specs.paragraph1: The Interlocking RRAP system represents advanced modular engineering, designed specifically to overcome the limitations of traditional fixed-spacing crossing solutions.
specs.paragraph2: Each installation is custom-configured to match your exact requirements, from rail profile and gauge type to sleeper configuration and fastener systems.
specs.paragraph3: The system's flexibility makes it ideal for challenging installations where standard solutions simply won't fit.

temporaryAccess.title: Temporary Access Points
temporaryAccess.description: Perfect for construction projects requiring temporary rail access with rapid deployment and removal capabilities.

semiPermanent.title: Semi-Permanent Solutions
semiPermanent.description: Ideal for medium-term projects where flexibility and adaptability to changing requirements is essential.

permanent.title: Permanent Installations
permanent.description: Long-term access points for industrial facilities, depots, and maintenance facilities requiring reliable performance.

irregular.title: Irregular Infrastructure
irregular.description: Specifically designed for challenging installations where standard spacing solutions won't work.

cta.title: Need Flexible Access Solutions?
cta.description: Discover how the Interlocking RRAP system can solve your most challenging access point requirements with custom-fit modular design.

overview.title: Everything You Need
overview.paragraph1: We offer a comprehensive range of spares and accessories designed to support every aspect of your rail crossing installation, maintenance, and operation. From lifting pins and hooks to aid the elevation of our products, to specialised fixings, tools, and finishing solutions.
overview.paragraph2: Our extensive inventory includes everything from precision-engineered connector bars and cover plates to specialty fasteners, ensuring you have access to the right components when you need them.
overview.highlightText: Can't find exactly what you need? Our technical team can often develop custom accessories to meet specific project requirements and site conditions.

installation.title: Installation Equipment
installation.description: Essential tools and equipment for safe and efficient installation of crossing systems.
installation.examples: Lifting pins, lifting hooks, tool kits, restraints

fixing.title: Fixing & Connection
fixing.description: Specialized fasteners, bolts, and connection solutions for secure system assembly.
fixing.examples: Connector bars, omni screws, M18 bolts, fixing kits

protection.title: Protection & Safety
protection.description: Safety equipment and protective components for enhanced installation and operation security.
protection.examples: Chain guards, deflector plates, movement restrictors

finishing.title: Finishing Solutions
finishing.description: Professional finishing touches including covers and seals.

components.title: System Components
components.description: Replacement parts and upgrade components for all crossing system types.
components.examples: Turret baseplates, end restraints, infill components

tools.title: Specialist Tools
tools.description: Purpose-built tools and equipment designed specifically for Rosehill Rail systems.
tools.examples: Impact drivers, specialist sockets, installation aids

cta.title: Need Something Specific?
cta.text: Our comprehensive accessory range is constantly expanding. Contact us directly for quotations, technical specifications, or to discuss custom solutions for your specific requirements.

rubberSection.title: Rubber Edge Beams - Our Recommended Solution
rubberSection.subtitle: Lightweight Innovation
rubberSection.description1: Rosehill Rail's rubber edge beams provide a durable, lightweight alternative to traditional concrete solutions. Manufactured from 100% recycled tyre rubber and bonded using cutting-edge cold cure technology, these beams offer significant weight savings whilst maintaining exceptional durability.
rubberSection.description2: With integrated drainage channels, non-spalling design, and strategic lifting points, our rubber edge beams deliver enhanced crossing support with improved sustainability credentials and reduced transport costs.
rubberSection.advantages: Network Rail acceptance, quick-fit installation system, and compatibility with all crossing systems make rubber edge beams the preferred choice for most applications.

weightComparison.title: Weight Comparison
weightComparison.summary: Significant weight reduction for easier installation and lower logistics costs

rubber.description: Our flagship solution combining sustainability, performance, and cost-effectiveness. Made from 100% recycled tyre rubber with cold cure bonding technology.

steel.name: Steel Edge Beams
steel.description: Maximum durability and strength for high-traffic areas where robustness is critical. Designed for the most demanding conditions.

plastic.name: Plastic Edge Beams
plastic.description: Lightweight, corrosion-resistant option perfect for installations requiring ease of handling and rapid deployment.

sustainability.title: Sustainable Materials
sustainability.desc: Rubber edge beams use 100% recycled tyre rubber, delivering improved sustainability credentials and environmental benefits.

installation.title: Quick Installation
installation.desc: Quick-fit installation system with strategic lifting points reduces installation time and associated labour costs.

durability.title: Enhanced Durability
durability.desc: Non-spalling design prevents cracking and maintains structural integrity throughout the extended service life.

transport.title: Reduced Transport Costs
transport.desc: Significant weight reduction versus concrete alternatives lowers transport costs and enables easier handling on site.

drainage.title: Integrated Drainage
drainage.desc: Built-in drainage channels prevent water accumulation and reduce maintenance requirements over time.

compatibility.title: Universal Compatibility
compatibility.desc: Compatible with all crossing systems and available in 1.8-metre standard length for flexible installation options.

standard.title: Standard Installations
standard.desc: Rubber edge beams recommended for most applications due to sustainability, weight reduction, and comprehensive performance benefits.

heavyDuty.title: Heavy-Duty Requirements
heavyDuty.desc: Steel edge beams for extreme load conditions and high-traffic areas where maximum durability and strength are critical.

rapidDeployment.title: Rapid Deployment
rapidDeployment.desc: Plastic edge beams for installations requiring rapid deployment, ease of handling, and corrosion resistance.

allSystems.title: All Crossing Systems
allSystems.desc: Compatible with StrandLock, LINK, TITAN, Baseplate, and Interlocking RRAP systems for comprehensive crossing support.

cta.title: Need the Right Edge Beam Solution?
cta.text: Discover how our rubber edge beams can provide lightweight, sustainable crossing support with significant cost and environmental benefits.

security.conicalParagraph1: Our unique anti-trespass panels feature a sophisticated conical stud design that provides enhanced deterrence while reducing installation time compared to traditional security solutions.
security.conicalParagraph2: Manufactured from 100% recycled rubber, these panels provide an environmentally responsible solution for railway safety while delivering proven results in reducing unauthorised track access.
security.networkRailDesc: Three distinct panel variations approved by Network Rail ensure compliance and effectiveness across different railway infrastructure requirements.
security.doubleFlangeDesc: For four-foot gauge applications (1490mm Ã— 1300mm Ã— 147mm, 116kg)
security.singleFlangeDesc: For outside four-foot applications (1487mm Ã— 1300mm Ã— 147mm, 110kg)
security.flangelessDesc: Full-width for platform applications (1484mm Ã— 1300mm Ã— 147mm, 98kg)

enhancedSecurity.title: Enhanced Security
enhancedSecurity.description: Up to 78% reduction in trespassing incidents significantly improves network safety and passenger security.

quickInstallation.title: Quick Installation
quickInstallation.description: Reduced installation time and labour costs with complete fixing kit supplied and no specific tools required.

networkRailApproved.title: Network Rail Approved
networkRailApproved.description: Three approved panel variations ensure compliance and effectiveness across different railway infrastructure needs.

environmentallySustainable.title: Environmentally Sustainable
environmentallySustainable.description: Manufactured from 100% recycled rubber providing an environmentally responsible safety solution.

selfDrainingDesign.title: Self-Draining Design
selfDrainingDesign.description: Self-draining configuration prevents water accumulation and reduces maintenance requirements over time.

lowerWholeLifeCosts.title: Lower Whole-Life Costs
lowerWholeLifeCosts.description: Minimised track possession time and simplified maintenance requirements reduce total cost of ownership.

specs.paragraph1: Anti-Trespass Panels are engineered to provide maximum deterrent effect while maintaining ease of installation and environmental sustainability. The modular construction allows for flexible deployment across various railway environments.
specs.paragraph2: Each panel features conical stud design for enhanced deterrence and is manufactured from 100% recycled rubber with self-draining configuration to minimise maintenance requirements.

fourFootGauge.title: Four-Foot Gauge
fourFootGauge.description: Double flange panels provide comprehensive security coverage for four-foot gauge track configurations.

outsideFourFoot.title: Outside Four-Foot
outsideFourFoot.description: Single flange design optimised for outside four-foot applications where space constraints apply.

platformApplications.title: Platform Applications
platformApplications.description: Full-width flangeless panels specifically designed for platform end security and passenger safety.

transitNetworks.title: Transit Networks
transitNetworks.description: Proven effective across light rail, metro, and heavy rail networks for comprehensive trespass prevention.

cta.title: Enhance Your Network Security
cta.description: Discover how Anti-Trespass Panels can reduce unauthorised access by up to 78% while providing environmentally sustainable rail safety solutions.

sustainability.title: Sustainable Footpath Solutions
sustainability.paragraph1: The Rosehill Walkway Panel offers a more secure, sustainable, and cost-effective alternative to traditional concrete paving blocks and aggregate footpaths.
sustainability.paragraph2: With minimal ground preparation required and weather-independent fitting capabilities, these panels deliver immediate benefits while providing exceptional long-term performance with reduced environmental impact.
sustainability.environmentalText: Significantly reduced carbon footprint versus concrete alternatives, with full reusability and relocatable design delivering both immediate and long-term environmental benefits.
sustainability.concreteDesc: Years typical lifespan with replacement required
sustainability.walkwayDesc: Years design life with full reusability
sustainability.comparisonNote: Extended service life with reusable and relocatable design

carbonFootprint.title: Reduced Carbon Footprint
carbonFootprint.desc: Significantly lower environmental impact compared to concrete with recycled rubber composition and reusable design.

quickInstallation.title: Quick Installation
quickInstallation.desc: Weather-independent fitting with minimal ground preparation and flexible installation options for rapid deployment.

slipResistant.title: Slip-Resistant Safety
slipResistant.desc: PSV 45 slip-resistant surface enhances worker safety and provides reliable access in all weather conditions.

minimalMaintenance.title: Minimal Maintenance
minimalMaintenance.desc: Weed and rodent resistant design with minimal ongoing maintenance requirements reduces lifecycle costs.

fullyReusable.title: Fully Reusable
fullyReusable.desc: Complete reusability and relocatable design allows panels to be moved and reused multiple times across projects.

lowerCosts.title: Lower Lifetime Costs
lowerCosts.desc: Extended 40+ year design life and reusability deliver superior value compared to traditional concrete solutions.

specs.title: Technical Specifications
specs.intro1: Walkway Panels are engineered for long-term performance with modular construction that allows for flexible installation across various access route applications. The slip-resistant surface meets PSV 45 standards for safe pedestrian access.
specs.intro2: Each 700mm Ã— 500mm panel is designed for simple installation with minimal ground preparation, making them ideal for temporary and permanent footpath solutions where environmental sustainability is a priority.

pedestrian.title: Pedestrian Pathways
pedestrian.desc: Alternative to concrete paving for pedestrian access routes with enhanced safety and environmental benefits.

construction.title: Construction Access
construction.desc: Temporary and permanent access routes for construction sites with quick installation and reusable design.

industrial.title: Industrial Walkways
industrial.desc: Durable walkway solutions for industrial facilities requiring slip-resistant and weather-independent access.

environmental.title: Environmental Sites
environmental.desc: Sustainable footpath solutions for environmentally sensitive areas with minimal ground disturbance requirements.

cta.title: Ready for Sustainable Footpaths?
cta.text: Discover how Walkway Panels can provide a durable, reusable alternative to concrete paving with 40+ year design life and enhanced environmental benefits.

hero.title:
StrandLock
Level Crossing System
hero.subtitle: Locked-in stability for the most demanding rail crossings. Post-tensioned steel strand technology delivers exceptional structural integrity.

technology.title: What is StrandLock?
technology.intro: StrandLock builds on the familiar Rosehill Baseplate installation process, with one key enhancement. Integrated channels within the panels allow a continuous, greased and sheathed steel strand to be threaded through the crossing once installation is complete.
technology.description: The strand is anchored at both ends and tensioned using a hydraulic jack, locking the entire crossing assembly firmly into place. This mechanical locking action significantly increases stability.
technology.step1: StrandLock panels are installed using standard Rosehill Rail methods
technology.step2: Steel strand is threaded through the integrated panel channels
technology.step3: Anchors installed and panels tightened to desired crossing length
technology.step4: Strand sealed and protected to prevent water ingress

benefit1.title: Enhanced Structural Performance
benefit1.description: The tensioned strand links every panel, improving load transfer and reducing relative movement between components. The result is a locked, unified crossing structure that resists panel migration and maintains alignment over time.

benefit2.title: Greater Design Flexibility
benefit2.description: StrandLock accommodates crossing angles and layouts that would otherwise prevent the use of a standard baseplate solution. Particularly suited to higher crossing angles and complex geometries.

benefit3.title: Reduced Maintenance Risk
benefit3.description: By locking panels together, joint wear and long-term movement are minimised, helping maintain ride quality and geometry throughout the service life of the crossing.

benefit4.title: Familiar Installation Process
benefit4.description: Installers benefit from a process that closely mirrors existing Baseplate installations, with minimal additional training required. The strand tensioning operation uses a hydraulic jack, available from Rosehill Rail.

benefit5.title: Circular Economy
benefit5.description: With no moulded metalwork within the panels, StrandLock crossings can be fully granulated at end of life â€” supporting a circular economy and reducing waste to landfill.

benefit6.title: Long-Term Dimensional Stability
benefit6.description: Critical for locations where maintaining precise alignment is essential. The post-tensioning system ensures the crossing maintains its geometry under repeated dynamic loading. Because the panels are held under compression, they are also less susceptible to gapping caused by thermal expansion and contraction in varying weather conditions.

specs.title: Technical Specifications
specs.pullQuote: "Once installed and tensioned, the system acts as a single, unified structure, improving load distribution under repeated rail and road traffic loading."
specs.compatibilityValue: All Rosehill Gauge Panels, Field Panels & Edge Beams
specs.applicationsValue: High Crossing Angles, Dynamic Loading, Complex Geometry

rail.title: Heavy Rail Crossings
rail.description: Engineered for main line railway crossings where structural integrity under high-frequency, heavy axle loads is essential. The unified structure resists the dynamic forces that cause conventional crossings to degrade.

tram.title: Tramway & Light Rail
tram.description: Ideal for urban tramway systems where aesthetics, ride quality, and minimal maintenance disruption are priorities. The locked panel system maintains smooth running surfaces across the service life.

road.title: High-Traffic Road Crossings
road.description: Designed to withstand combined rail and heavy road vehicle loading. The post-tensioned system distributes loads across the entire crossing structure, preventing localised stress damage.

cta.title: Speak to Our Rail Specialists
cta.description: If you are planning a level crossing project and need guidance on whether StrandLock is the right solution, our technical team is here to help.
cta.support: Our technical team can support system selection, design guidance, and installation planning to ensure the most appropriate solution is specified for each site.
cta.alternative: Or visit our full contact page
